mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.parent_id, t.var_code, t.var_name, t.var_value, t.type, t.`status` FROM ktf_sys_dic t LEFT JOIN ( SELECT d1.id FROM ktf_sys_dic d1 WHERE d1.var_code = #{pVarCode} ) A ON t.parent_id = A.id WHERE t.var_code = #{varCode}
SELECT d.var_code FROM ktf_sys_dic d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT d1.id FROM ktf_sys_dic d1 WHERE d1.parent_id = #{ppId} AND d1.var_code = #{pVarCode} ) A ON d.parent_id = A.id WHERE d.parent_id = A.id
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ktf_sys_dic WHERE FIND_IN_SET(id, sys_dic_getChildren(#{id}))
